00016     inline std::string formatMessage (const std::string& message, Runtime& runtime)
00017     {
00018         std::string formattedMessage;
00019 
00020         for (std::size_t i=0; i<message.size(); ++i)
00021         {
00022             char c = message[i];
00023 
00024             if (c!='%')
00025                 formattedMessage += c;
00026             else
00027             {
00028                 ++i;
00029                 if (i<message.size())
00030                 {
00031                     c = message[i];
00032 
00033                     if (c=='S' || c=='s')
00034                     {
00035                         int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00036                         runtime.pop();
00037                         formattedMessage += runtime.getStringLiteral (index);
00038                     }
00039                     else if (c=='g' || c=='G')
00040                     {
00041                         Type_Integer value = runtime[0].mInteger;
00042                         runtime.pop();
00043 
00044                         std::ostringstream out;
00045                         out << value;
00046                         formattedMessage += out.str();
00047                     }
00048                     else if (c=='f' || c=='F' || c=='.')
00049                     {
00050                         while (c!='f' && i<message.size())
00051                         {
00052                             ++i;
00053                         }
00054 
00055                         float value = runtime[0].mFloat;
00056                         runtime.pop();
00057 
00058                         std::ostringstream out;
00059                         out << value;
00060                         formattedMessage += out.str();
00061                     }
00062                     else if (c=='%')
00063                         formattedMessage += "%";
00064                     else
00065                     {
00066                         formattedMessage += "%";
00067                         formattedMessage += c;
00068                     }
00069                 }
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         return formattedMessage;
00074     }

00076     class OpMessageBox : public Opcode1
00077     {
00078         public:
00079 
00080             virtual void execute (Runtime& runtime, unsigned int arg0)
00081             {
00082                 // message
00083                 int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00084                 runtime.pop();
00085                 std::string message = runtime.getStringLiteral (index);
00086 
00087                 // buttons
00088                 std::vector<std::string> buttons;
00089 
00090                 for (std::size_t i=0; i<arg0; ++i)
00091                 {
00092                     int index = runtime[0].mInteger;
00093                     runtime.pop();
00094                     buttons.push_back (runtime.getStringLiteral (index));
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 std::reverse (buttons.begin(), buttons.end());
00098 
00099                 // handle additional parameters
00100                 std::string formattedMessage = formatMessage (message, runtime);
00101 
00102                 runtime.getContext().messageBox (formattedMessage, buttons);
00103             }
00104     };

00134     class OpRandom : public Opcode0
00135     {
00136         public:
00137 
00138             virtual void execute (Runtime& runtime)
00139             {
00140                 double r = static_cast<double> (std::rand()) / RAND_MAX; // [0, 1)
00141 
00142                 Type_Integer limit = runtime[0].mInteger;
00143 
00144                 if (limit<0)
00145                     throw std::runtime_error (
00146                         "random: argument out of range (Don't be so negative!)");
00147 
00148                 Type_Integer value = static_cast<Type_Integer> (r*limit); // [o, limit)
00149 
00150                 runtime[0].mInteger = value;
00151             }
00152     };
